Pre-Game Insights: Afghanistan captain Ibrahim Zadran announced that ace spinner Rashid Khan will not be participating in any of the three matches.
Ibrahim Zadran believed that even without Rashid, there was enough firepower in his team.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Afghanistan's spin workload in India will be shared between Mujeeb Ur Rahman, Mohammad Nabi, Noor Ahmad, Qais Ahmad, and Sharafuddin Ashraf.
Qais Ahmad took the most wickets in the UAE series, with six at an average of 11.16 and an economy rate of 6.70.
Others: Rashid Khan underwent lower back surgery after the ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 and has been missing competitive games since then.
The three-match T20I series will begin on Thursday in Mohali, followed by Indore and Bangalore on January 14 and 17.
